application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of condition 30 pursuant to planning permission reference 161144FUL dated 14/02/2017  and condition 16 pursuant to planning permission reference 192597OPDFUL for demolition of all existing buildings and the redevelopment of the site to provide a double storey basement with four buildings of 2, 9, 11, 32 and 42 storeys comprising 578 residential flats (Use class C3)(mix of 1 bed, 2 bed and 3 bed flats) and 3179sqm (GIA) of flexible use class Al and/or A2 and/or A3 and/or A4 and/or B1 and/or D1 and/or D2 floorspace, landscaped east-to-west public route between Victoria Road and Portal Way, together with associated amenity and play space, roof gardens, cycle parking, car parking, servicing, public realm improvements, landscaping and infrastructure works. (Full Planning Application accompanied by an Environmental Impact Assessment)
